members.member: The overlapping body or area. Can be null if the object was created with [method SGPhysics2DServer.collision_object_create].
The RID of the overlapping body or area.
The overlapping shape, either a [SGCollisionShape2D] or [SGCollisionPolygon2D] node. Can be null if the shape was created with [method SGPhysics2DServer.shape_create].
The RID of the overlapping shape.
